treatment-md.title: Rivulus amanapira Costa, 2004, new species
treatment-md.article-title: Rivulus uakti sp. n. and R. amanapira sp. n. (Teleostei: Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae): two new species from the upper Rio Negro, Brazilian Amazon.
